panels.title: DB Pool Utilization
panels.description: PostgreSQL connection pool utilization. Threshold markers at 80% (warning) and 95% (critical).

panels.title: Retry Queue Depth
panels.description: Number of events awaiting retry persistence. High values indicate PostgreSQL connectivity issues.

panels.title: Avg Batch Size
panels.description: Average number of events per persistence batch.

panels.title: Persistence Duration (p50/p95)
panels.description: Event batch persistence duration. Warning at 500ms, critical at 1s.

panels.title: Retry Outcomes
panels.description: Success vs failure outcomes for event persistence retries.

panels.title: Cost Flush Duration
panels.description: p50 and p95 latency for cost batch flush to database.

panels.title: Cost Anomaly Rate
panels.description: Cost anomalies detected by type: high_single_call, high_session_total, negative_cost.

panels.title: Cost Retry Queue Depth
panels.description: Number of cost records waiting for retry after flush failure.

panels.title: Cost Flush Operations
panels.description: Success vs failure rate of cost batch flush operations.

panels.title: Publish Latency (p95/p99)
panels.description: Event publish latency from call to Redis queue. Warning at 50ms, critical at 100ms.

panels.title: Event Type Distribution
panels.description: Distribution of published event types over the last hour.

panels.title: Batch Queue Depth
panels.description: Current depth of the event batch priority queue. Warning at 50, critical at 100.

panels.title: Graph Node Errors by Node (rate/5m)
panels.description: Error rate per graph node. High values indicate persistent failures in specific nodes.

panels.title: API Endpoint Errors (rate/5m)
panels.description: Error rate per API endpoint and status code. High values indicate problematic endpoints.

panels.title: Top API Errors (last 1h)
panels.description: Top 10 API endpoints by error count in the last hour.

panels.title: Top Graph Node Errors (last 1h)
panels.description: Top 10 graph nodes by error count in the last hour.
